message: The U.S. Department of Homeland Security urged computer users to disable Oracle Corp's Java software, amplifying security experts' prior warnings to hundreds of millions of consumers and businesses that use it to surf the Web.
name: Government warns on Java as security concerns escalate
caption: www.reuters.com
